description.value:
Add one of the following to the debilitations from which you can choose when you Envenom. These debilitations reduce the damage of all stages as noted.

  • Bungling (level 13) Reduce damage by 1 die

    Stage 1 no effect

    Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}

    Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2}

  • Devitalizing (level 13) Reduce damage by 3 dice

    Stage 1 no effect

    Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained 1}

    Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained 2}

  • Nauseating (level 13) Reduce damage by 2 dice

    Stage 1 no effect

    Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1}

    Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 2}

  • Weakening (level 13) Reduce damage by 1 die

    Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1}

    Stage 2 enfeebled 1

    Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2}

Special You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different debilitation each time.
